name: City Chest
description: Open to gain MVP materials from areas on Christmas Village difficulty and below

name: Claytos Cracking Earth Armor
description: When you put it on, this armor wraps you tightly and makes you feel the trust and warmth of earth.

name: Claytos Cracking Earth Armor [1]
description: When you put it on, this armor wraps you tightly and makes you feel the trust and warmth of earth.

name: Cleaver [1]
description: An axe used to cut the meat of brutes.
effect: HP Regen ＋10,When killing demi-human monsters, Caster has a 10% chance to restore his/her own HP

name: Cleaver [2]
description: An axe used to cut the meat of brutes.
effect: HP Regen ＋10,When killing demi-human monsters, Caster has a 10% chance to restore his/her own HP

name: Clip
description: A prop for fixing hair. If you look carefully, it is an ornament that can hold something.

name: Clip [1]
description: A prop for fixing hair. If you look carefully, it is an ornament that can hold something.

name: Clock
description: Clock made of a nameless Metal. It seems to contain the power of time and can be used to Craft Headwear.

name: Clock Guard Medal
description: Mosman awarded the brave adventurers Clock Guard Medals.
